articles.description: Adam Peters declined GM interview requests, but that's not a tip about John Lynch's 49ers future. "No, I'm good," Lynch said, laughing.
articles.content: It probably took less than an hour for John Lynch to get asked the question inside 49ers headquarters. Maybe less than 10 minutes. News broke that assistant general manager Adam Peters was declining … [+10025 chars]
